question: Your eligibility notice
text:
Your eligibility notice
          
        
When you apply for coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, you'll receive an eligibility notice that explains if you are eligible for coverage, and if you qualify for any financial assistance like advance premium tax credits (APTC) or cost sharing reductions (CSR).

This notice will also let you know if there are any additional steps you may need to take to verify your eligibility. It is important that you understand each household members eligibility, as well as any members conditional eligibility that requires an action to ensure that you are able to enroll (or stay enrolled) in your coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.
